name: BUS DRIVER (itch)
description:
Being a bus driver is important...

Especially when you are

THE ONLY ONE IN THE WORLD!!!

You are the only bus driver in this tiny world, so work you have plenty.

Pickup all the passengers before they get bored and cease to exist while avoiding buildings at all costs!!

Each level brings a speed boost to the mix.

How many passengers can you pick up?!?!?!

BUS DRIVER is a game made for the Ludum Dare #38 Compo

Source Code can be found here: https://github.com/Rombusevil/LudumDare38

Ludum Dare entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/bus-driver/
